name: Go On (Mir9645)
description:
Go On  is a simple platformer game where go can't jump up by yourself. You will go through challenges to find creatures to talk to, and come to a realization of your inner strength. 

*You can dash endlessly in this game, but be ware: gravity is still pulling you down.  

*Currently under development

Controls:

AD, Arrow keys (to move left and right)

Left Shift (to dash)

Click (the arrow and NPC dialogue)
